pageProduct.name: Alkira Refine Vitamin C + Tonic 200ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

A best seller for good reason. A pore purifying , radiance enhancing tonic perfect for post-cleanse balance and brightening.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits: • A super charged blend of Kakadu Plum, Quandong and Finger Lime Caviar infused with Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate – a water soluble form of vitamin C, designed to transform skin to reveal radiant, clear skin. • Natural AHA’s to support resurfacing and reduce the appearance of blemishes and wrinkles • Potent plant derived antioxidants from Davidson Plum – containing phenolic acids and flavone glycosides to promote skin elasticity through enhanced collagen and elastin production. • Citric acids to encourage skin rejuvenation and to unclog pores • Finished with soothing Cucumber

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Fruit Extract, Santalum Acuminatum (Quandong) Fruit Extract, Davidsonia Jerseyana (Davidson Plum) Fruit Extract, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Australasica (Finger Lime) Fruit Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Polyglyceryl-10-Laurate, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Limonene* *Allergens

Directions

Soak a cotton pad or cloth and gently wipe over face
